title: IPPLAA-International Professional and Practice License Authentication Alliance
author: unknown
text: International Professional and Practice License Authentication Alliance International Finance and Management Academy Certificates Certificate Fees and Good Standing: IPPLAA Certificate and Professional Designation applicants pay initial certification and graduate fees. Good standing fees are set by the authority. Each applicant pays the initial Certificate and membership fee as set by the authority. After the initial membership and certification time period as stated on the actual certificate, the member is expected to renew their certificates and complete the required continuing education and ethics requirements. Sometimes, the approved educational institution collects the fees and processes membership and certification for the authority of IPPLAA. In other cases, eligible applicants apply directly to the authority on a case by case basis and make registration payment. Certificates
